subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Jason Donald’s hustle during what should have been a perfect game for Armando Galarraga underscored the Indians’ image as a scrappy young team — a theme they hope to build on this season.
snippet: Jason Donald’s hustle during what should have been a perfect game for Armando Galarraga underscored the Indians’ image as a scrappy young team — a theme they hope to build on this season.
